channel.title: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
channel.description:
[url]https://www.gamespot.com/news/ea-sought-to-buy-valve-for-1-billion-report-6394880?tag=Topslot;Today039sGamingNews;EaSoughtToBuyValveFo[/url]
Finally someone steps up to EA and their attempts to monopolize the gaming industry, thank you Valve and Gabe.

item.title: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
item.dc:creator: Old_Mate
item.description:
Valve is estimated to be worth approximately $3 billion with Gabe Newell himself being worth an estimated $1.5 billion.

EA are gonna have to do WAAAY better than that.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)

item.title: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
If it continues how it is, would it be that surprising that valve ended up being worth more than EA? and lets face it, valve buying EA might solve a few issues : )

Read full topic
item.source: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)

item.title: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
item.dc:creator: DownloadFailed
item.description:
Well, turns out 90% of this thread is a lie. Disappointing, really. I was hoping that Valve actually gave EA the middle finger instead of just ignoring them like they usually do. One can dream, though.

Btw, @OldDirtyBastard: I can’t stop watching your signature.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)

item.title: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Seriously, EA should’ve offered 10+ billion.
I’d sell the fuck out.

Bad judgement. Seriously, am I the only one thinking it’s some kind of a PR exercise?

Read full topic

They made the right choice.

item.title: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Hell yeah! That’s a pretty good word, “disintegrate.” Good for Valve, shove it up EA’s asses.

Bloodshot:

This won’t ever happen obviously, but if EA ever bought out valve I’m sure BM would have been shut down in a heartbeat.

I’m sure they’d ask to bring them in and have it as a payed product. If they disagree, then comes the cease and desist.

M-Man:

Yeah, Valve! Yeah SCIENCE!

I love you right now, heh heh.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve sticks it to "the man" (no not freeman)
